SELECT a.* FROM biz_seller a Where a.Id = #{Id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_seller (Code, Name, SellerId, Tel, Address, Province, City, Area, IsInstall, SetUpDate, CreateDate, OrderNum,Longitude,Latitude) VALUES (#{Code}, #{Name}, #{SellerId}, #{Tel}, #{Address}, #{Province}, #{City}, #{Area}, #{IsInstall}, #{SetUpDate}, #{CreateDate}, #{OrderNum},#{Longitude},#{Latitude})
